ABOUT US

ABOUT DEVANADA

Passionate developers dedicated to delivering results

We are a team of experienced developers, dedicated to crafting beautiful, intuitive and user-friendly websites.

Bringing your digital vision to life, one line of code at a time

Our approach is collaborative and consultative allowing us to understand your unique needs bringing your vision to life.

Devanada was founded by two passionate front-end developers who are dedicated to delivering the best possible digital experiences to businesses and organizations in the Greater Vancouver area.

With a combined experience of over a decade, we have a deep understanding of the latest front-end technologies and trends.

SERVICES

OUR SERVICES

Crafting stunning websites with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript expertise

Multi-page Website on Your Preferred Platform

Whether you prefer GoDaddy, Shopify, WordPress, or another web hosting service, we will create a stunning multi-page website that showcases your products and services. Our experts will design a user-friendly website that drives conversions and enhances your online presence.

Email Contact Form

Stay connected with your customers through a professional email contact form. We will set up a seamless and secure form that allows your customers to easily reach out to you and your business, ensuring prompt communication and improved customer satisfaction.

Mobile-friendly website Optimized for Speed

In today's fast-paced digital world, having a mobile-friendly site that loads quickly is crucial. Our developers will optimize your site for speed, ensuring it provides an exceptional user experience on all devices.

Accessibility Compliant

Making your website accessible to all users, including those with disabilities, is essential. Our team will ensure your site meets accessibility compliance requirements, fostering an inclusive online environment for all visitors.

Domain Connection and Setup

Leave the technical details to us. We will take care of connecting and setting up your domain, ensuring your website is accessible to users worldwide while you focus on growing your business.

Copywriting and Commercial Use Images

Engaging content and high-quality images are vital for a successful website. Our talented team of copywriters and designers will create captivating content and source visually stunning commercial-use images that resonate with your target audience and elevate your brand's online presence.

Three Revisions for a Tailored Solution

At Devanada, customer satisfaction is our top priority. We offer three revisions to ensure your website meets your needs and exceeds your expectations.

APPROACH

OUR APPROACH

We approach every project with a 4 step process, ensuring that we cover all aspects of your website development.

1

Define

2

Design

3

Develop

4

Deliver

1

Define


After we’ve identified the brand colors, fonts, and feel of the website, we will use Figma to quickly create a variety of mockup designs to determine which layouts and formats would work best for your growing business. Using Figma, we’ll be able to identify the different UI elements needed such as buttons, menus, forms and more on an interface design.

2

Design


A cohesive user interface is a key component to a successful website. By creating brand consistency across the site, adding animations and features to the UI, we can make a site that is not only visually appealing, but also easy for users to navigate.

3

Develop


Devanada's front-end developers master modern, cutting-edge technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript to create beautiful websites that adapt easily to different platforms and devices. Our developers take your vision and turn it into reality one line of code at a time.

4

Deliver


Our extensive planning phase ensures that the end product aligns with the goal of capturing customers. In the product development phase, we conduct rigorous usability tests that ensure the website is perfect prior to launch. We follow up with a thorough quality assurance process, which includes cross browser testing, responsive design testing, and performance optimization. We also thoroughly test for SEO compatibility and responsiveness across devices to ensure important features are easily accessible across all platforms.
